original_title: UFC on Fox 19: Teixeira vs. Evans
overview: UFC on Fox 19: Teixeira vs. Evans was a mixed martial arts event held on April 16, 2016 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Florida.  The event was the second that the organization has hosted in the Tampa Bay Area, and first since UFC Fight Night: Lauzon vs. Stephens in February 2009.
tagline: UFC on Fox: Teixeira vs. Evans
title: UFC on Fox 19: Teixeira vs. Evans
